params.context: Contains the latestBlock when skip was requested, and the requestedBlock to skip to.
params.requestResult: Contains the new header and data commitment.

params.context: Contains the latest block when step was requested.
params.requestResult: Contains the new header and data commitment.

requestCombinedSkip(uint64).details: Skip proof is valid if at least 1/3 of the voting power signed on requestedBlock is from validators in the validator set for latestBlock. Request will fail if the requested block is more than DATA_COMMITMENT_MAX blocks ahead of the latest block. Pass both the latest block and the requested block as context, as the latest block may change before the request is fulfilled.

requestCombinedStep().details: Only used if 2/3 of voting power in a validator set changes in one block.

DATA_COMMITMENT_MAX().notice: The maximum number of blocks that can be skipped in a single request.

blockHeightToHeaderHash(uint64).notice: Maps block heights to their header hashes.

callbackCombinedSkip(bytes,bytes).notice: Stores the new header for requestedBlock and the data commitment for the block range [latestBlock, requestedBlock).

callbackCombinedStep(bytes,bytes).notice: Stores the new header for latestBlock + 1 and the data commitment for the block range [latestBlock, latestBlock + 1).

constructor.notice: Initialize the contract with the address of the gateway contract.

dataCommitments(bytes32).notice: Maps block ranges to their data commitments. Block ranges are stored as keccak256(abi.encode(startBlock, endBlock)).

functionNameToId(string).notice: Maps function names to their IDs.

gateway().notice: The address of the gateway contract.

getFunctionId(string).notice: Get the function ID for a function name.

getHeaderHash(uint64).notice: Get the header hash for a block height.

latestBlock().notice: The latest block that has been committed.

requestCombinedSkip(uint64).notice: Prove the validity of the header at requested block and a data commitment for the block range [latestBlock, requestedBlock).

requestCombinedStep().notice: Prove the validity of the header at latestBlock + 1 and a data commitment for the block range [latestBlock, latestBlock + 1).

setGenesisHeader(uint64,bytes32).notice: Note: Only for testnet. The genesis header should be set when initializing the contract.

updateFunctionId(string,bytes32).notice: Update the function ID for a function name.

updateGateway(address).notice: Update the address of the gateway contract.
